components.name: Application Gateway
components.description: Acts as a load balancer and provides application-level routing and security.

components.name: Web App
components.description: The core application that users interact with, hosted on Azure App Service.

components.name: Azure SQL Database
components.description: A managed relational database service for storing application data.

components.name: Web App Firewall
components.description: Protects web applications from common threats and vulnerabilities.

components.name: Azure Active Directory
components.description: Manages user identities and access to resources.

data_flows.description: Routes incoming user requests to the Web App for processing.
Retrieves and stores application data in the Azure SQL Database.
Sends traffic to the Web App Firewall for security checks before reaching the Web App.
Authenticates user access and manages identity verification.

trust_boundaries.name: User Interaction Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between external users and the application components.

trust_boundaries.name: Data Storage Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary protecting the database and sensitive data storage.
